name: MatejLach
text:
@roytang

Shared: Webfaction - recommended if you don't need root, you get everything taken care of, including Lets Encrypt.

Downside: They've been acquired by GoDady.

For a dedicated VPS, you can't really go wrong with either of Linode, DO or Vultr.

I'd recommend Linode since they're been solid for me and are a bit of an underdog against DO right now despite being the "original" Linux VPS.

Also, DO's heavily VC-backed which makes me think some sort of an unoptimal 'exit' is likely.
